DOC.brief_summary: Investigation possible benefit transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) treatment depression patient Parkinson 's Disease , randomize placebo-controlled clinical trial .
DOC.detailed_description: We aim investigate effect transcranial direct current stimulation ( tDCS ) treatment depression patient Parkinson 's Disease . We design clinical trial volunteer fulfill inclusion criterion receive 15 session tDCS 1 week ( 3 session day , 30 minute interval ) . Subjects randomly allocate two group , one receive real intervention ( active ) receive placebo intervention ( sham ) . The collaborator charge administer session participate evaluation , keep subject evaluator blind nature session . Subjects evaluate baseline , end session , 1 week , 4 week 8 week , latter main outcome . We aim enroll 50 subject , 25 arm . The sample size calculation take consideration previous clinical trial use tDCS depression different setting .
